messages.page_description: What's next for the Svelte Vietnam project
messages.dong_objective: reduce complexity of the sveltevietnam.dev codebase and design, experiment with Svelte 5, set up a user system and a minimal custom markdown editor to streamline the job posting and blog writing processes.
messages.dong_task_job_posting: Allow recruiters to create job listings directly on sveltevietnam.dev
messages.dong_task_post_submit_in_app: Allow users to write blog posts directly on sveltevietnam.dev (instead of through Github issue and PR)
messages.dong_github_oauth: Set up quick login via GitHub OAuth
messages.dong_inter_4: Upgrade the Inter font to version 4
messages.dong_tailwing_4: Simplify the styling setup, experiment with Tailwind 4.0
messages.dong_refactor: Simplify and unify the design of the entire sveltevietnam.dev website
messages.tu_objective: prepare for the first official (pre)release of sveltevietnam.dev (v1.0.0-next), focus on developing the blog page, the events page, and the necessary features and content for the community to start actively participating and contributing.
messages.tu_highlight_open_collective: Send request to create the Svelte Vietnam Open Collective, started accepting financial donations
messages.tu_highlight_first_offline_meetup: Organize the first offline community meetup in Ho Chi Minh city
messages.tu_highlight_first_online_meetup: Organize the first online community meetup
messages.tu_highlight_first_ui: Establish basic infrastructure and initial design for the sveltevietnam.dev website
messages.tu_task_survey: Draft content and design for the “Svelte Vietnam Community Survey”
messages.tu_task_page_jobs: Introduce the Jobs page with basic design
messages.tu_task_page_design: Introduce the Design page to document the design elements of the Svelte Vietnam project
messages.tu_task_progresive_enhancement: Support users without JavaScript access (progressive enhancement), especially for essential features like multilingual navigation, theme switcher, mobile menu, and splash screen
messages.tu_task_page_coc: Introduce the Code of Conduct page with basic design
messages.tu_task_og: Set up custom Open Graph images for each completed page
messages.tu_task_blog_post: Set up the process for posting or linking blog posts through Github issue and direct code guide for posting
messages.tu_task_references: Introduce the “Technical Reference” and “Contributing Guidelines” documents
messages.tu_task_page_blog: Introduce the Blog page with basic design
messages.tu_task_page_events: Introduce the Events page with basic design
messages.tu_task_mailer: Design infrastructure and initialize mailer service to manage user registration for email notifications
messages.au_lac_objective: initiate the project, build the infrastructure, set up a basic development process
messages.au_lac_highlight_roadmap: Build a roadmap for the development of Svelte Vietnam
messages.au_lac_highlight_initiation: Establish an initial Information Architecture and Brand Identity for Svelte Vietnam
messages.au_lac_task_metadata: Set up basic metadata and SEO, including sitemap.xml, Google Search Console, Google Analytics
messages.au_lac_task_discord: Develop websocket service and bot for Discord server, making ways to gradually add new features to enrich experience for users on both Discord and the sveltevietnam.dev site
messages.au_lac_task_page_home: Introduce the Home page page with basic design
messages.au_lac_task_page_branding_repo: Initiate the branding repository to store public assets (including logo with version history) and the “Branding Guidelines” document (discussing about usage of Svelte Vietnam's public assets)
messages.au_lac_task_logo: Design and implement the official logo of Svelte Vietnam
messages.au_lac_task_project_reference: Publish the “Project Reference” document, providing an overview of the Svelte Vietnam project
messages.au_lac_task_github: Setup the Svelte Vietnam Github organization, project, and sveltevietnam.dev repository
